tool_description: API provides a simple and efficient way to check the domain authority (DA), page authority (PA), and spam score (SS) of a website, allowing users to evaluate its search engine ranking potential and spam risk in one go.
name: DA, PA, SS Checker
title: DA, PA, SS Checker

api_list.name: DA, PA, SS Check
api_list.description: Check domain authority, page authority and spam score
